actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Labor Management Relations Act, 1947 to extend injunctive relief specifically to prevent destruction of perishable food crops due to threatened or actual strike or lockups.

summary.text: Allows injunctive relief under the Labor Management Relations Act of 1947 to prevent destruction of perishable food crops due to threatened or actual strike or lockout.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Labor Management Relations Act, 1947 to extend injunctive relief specifically to prevent destruction of perishable food crops due to threatened or actual strike or lockups.
